text: @BorisJohnson I'm sure Boris means well, he's really into science and technology, he seems to trust his scientific advisers without debate, or peer review.  You can find 'NHS England' covid-19 announced deaths for the regions up to 7 July 2020?

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
